BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 020078 ZSQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Queens, Council District no. 31 to allow a combined firehouse and ambulance station to be located in a R4 district.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, 303 Beach 49th St Firehouse EMS, Queens (020078ZSQ)

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 020079 PSQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning site selection for a capital project to be located at 303 Beach 49th Street , Borough of Queens, Council District no. 31.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.

Landmarks Preservation Commission designation no. DL - 334, LP - 2102, pursuant to §3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation of the Murray Hill Historic District, located at generally between Park and Lexington avenues and East 35th and East 38th streets, Borough of Manhattan, Council District nos. 2 and 3, as a landmark.  (Non-ULURP no. 20025240 HKM).
